product_name: Sierra Designs Stretch Rain Jacket - Women's
long_description: Built with 4-way stretch and a soft feel, the women's waterproof, breathable Sierra Designs Stretch Rain Jacket is super comfortable for hiking, backpacking or travel. Waterproof, breathable polyester has a polyurethane laminate as well as a durable water repellent finish so precipitation beads up and rolls off. Jersey-knit backing excels at wicking away moisture to keep you dry inside. 4-way stretch allows unrestricted range of movement. Embedded bamboo carbon eliminates odors. Die-cut underarm vents keep you cool without the bulk and hassle of zippers. 2 high hand pockets and a chest pocket are accessible with a pack on. Hem drawcord and adjustable cuffs seal out cold. Sierra Designs Stretch Rain Jacket for women features a trim cut that fits over a base layer and light mid layer.
short_description: Built with 4-way stretch and a soft feel, the women's waterproof, breathable Sierra Designs Stretch Rain Jacket is super comfortable for hiking, backpacking or travel.
